channel.title: RUBIX 317 eco server beta
channel.description:
Welcome to the world of Rubix! We are the outcome of two ex-runescape players that have been all over the RSPS world and wanted to dive in with our own server. We are a great eco server with 100% uptime!! We continuously update the server and listen to what the players want. Our main and greatest objective is just to become the most addictive fun friendly server around. So bring your mates and come enjoy a great server in the making.
LINKS rubix317.org
FEATURES: +Brand new donar area +Custom items (lemon lime, phats, Legend of zelda link, fantasy sword, Rainbow shard armour.) ect and many more +Custom bosses (::bed, ::roc) and many more to come +Great staff +Stable server with 100% uptime +Unique dungeonerring +Balanced xp rates +Working prayer, ancients. +Active staff and playerbase
[IMG]http://i43.tinypic.com/2h5r7k6.png[/img] [IMG]http://i44.tinypic.com/28cdi0m.png[/img] [IMG]http://i39.tinypic.com/28vehz8.png[/img] [IMG]http://i42.tinypic.com/e8wrnk.png[/img]

item.title: RUBIX 317 eco server beta
item.dc:creator: @Ix_Soulcist_xI Soulcist
item.description:
@Ix_Soulcist_xI wrote:

That’s an interesting homepage there, I like it, however, the banner and theme used for forum itself does not fit with the homepage (it doesn’t always have to but is a lot more appealing) so I’d recommend do something about that. As for the banner itself though, I’d recommend using another one - that is honestly quite ugly, sorry.

The server looks interesting I suppose, that shoutbox is annoying though.

Good luck with the server though, I wish for the best!

Read full topic
